#summary How to load the XSSF plugin ?
#labels Featured

= XSSF plugin loading instructions =
 # Start Metasploit Framework (Console for example)
 # Connect to a database if that's not automatically done
 # Load XSSF plugin using the command '{{{load xssf}}}'.
    # XSSF server port can be modified using the command '{{{load xssf ServerPort=80}}}'.
    # XSSF server URI can be changed using the command '{{{load xssf ServerUri=/}}}'.
    # XSSF debug mode can be activated using the command '{{{load xssf Debug=true}}}'.
    # Remote access to XSSF GUI and Tunnel can be activated using the command '{{{load xssf Public=true}}}'.
    # Quiet XSSF mode while using attack commands or tunnel can be activated using the command '{{{load xssf Quiet=true}}}'.
